overview: Nikakudori is also known as an alias in Sichuan games using Mahjong tiles. When it is possible to connect the surface and the surface of Mahjong tiles in a straight line within that three-connected at a right angle, you can get rid of the mahjong tiles. Mahjong tiles and clear the game is to get rid of and all. Nikakudori Deluxe [Nice Price Series Vol.11] is a puzzle game that uses mahjong tiles. Flip all the tiles over by matching pairs. But pay attention to the rules! The pairs have to be touching, or connected by other tiles that have already been flipped over. The game features also a rule explanation and 3 kinds of mahjong tiles.
